verses.verse: בַּשָּׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> bash-sha-Nah year הָעֲשִׂירִ֔ית <S%H6224><s%> ha-'a-si-Rit, In the tenth בָּעֲשִׂרִ֕י <S%H6224><s%> ba-'a-si-Ri in the tenth בִּשְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> bish-Neim both עָשָׂ֖ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh; [day] of the month הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- Son אָדָ֕ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man שִׂ֣ים <S%H7760><s%> sim set פָּנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nei-cha, thy face עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against פַּרְעֹ֖ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh against Pharaoh מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech king מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt וְהִנָּבֵ֣א <S%H5012><s%> ve-hin-na-Ve and prophesy עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav, against וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and against מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim against him and against all Egypt כֻּלָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lah. all

דַּבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> dab-Ber Speak וְאָמַרְתָּ֜ <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> koh- Thus אָמַ֣ר׀ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD הִנְנִ֤י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha I am against פַּרְעֹ֣ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh Behold I [am] against thee Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt הַתַּנִּים֙ <S%H8577><s%> hat-tan-Nim dragon הַגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol, the great הָרֹבֵ֖ץ <S%H7257><s%> ha-ro-Vetz that lieth בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch in the midst יְאֹרָ֑יו <S%H2975><s%> ye-'o-Rav; of his rivers אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher that אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar which hath said לִ֥י <S%H99999><s%> li יְאֹרִ֖י <S%H2975><s%> ye-'o-Ri My river וַאֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni myself עֲשִׂיתִֽנִי׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-si-Ti-ni. [is] mine own and I have made

וְנָתַתִּ֤י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti But I will put; חַחִיִּים cha-chi-yim כחַחִים֙ <S%H2397><s%> cha-Chim bracelet קבִּלְחָיֶ֔יךָ <S%H3895><s%> bil-cha-Yei-cha, in thy jaws וְהִדְבַּקְתִּ֥י <S%H1692><s%> ve-hid-bak-Ti to stick דְגַת־ <S%H1710><s%> de-gat- and I will cause the fish יְאֹרֶ֖יךָ <S%H2975><s%> ye-'o-Rei-cha of thy rivers בְּקַשְׂקְשֹׂתֶ֑יךָ <S%H7193><s%> be-kas-ke-so-Tei-cha; unto thy scales וְהַעֲלִיתִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5927><s%> ve-ha-'a-li-Ti-cha and I will bring thee up מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> mit-Toch out of the midst יְאֹרֶ֔יךָ <S%H2975><s%> ye-'o-Rei-cha, of thy rivers וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all דְּגַ֣ת <S%H1710><s%> de-Gat and all the fish יְאֹרֶ֔יךָ <S%H2975><s%> ye-'o-Rei-cha, of thy rivers בְּקַשְׂקְשֹׂתֶ֖יךָ <S%H7193><s%> be-kas-ke-so-Tei-cha unto thy scales תִּדְבָּֽק׃ <S%H1692><s%> tid-Bak. shall stick

וּנְטַשְׁתִּ֣יךָ <S%H5203><s%> u-ne-tash-Ti-cha And I will leave הַמִּדְבָּ֗רָה <S%H4057><s%> ham-mid-Ba-rah, thee [thrown] into the wilderness אוֹתְךָ֙ <S%H853><s%> 'ot-Cha וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all דְּגַ֣ת <S%H1710><s%> de-Gat thee and all the fish יְאֹרֶ֔יךָ <S%H2975><s%> ye-'o-Rei-cha, of thy rivers עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on פְּנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei upon the open הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> has-sa-Deh fields תִּפּ֔וֹל <S%H5307><s%> tip-Pol, thou shalt fall לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תֵאָסֵ֖ף <S%H622><s%> te-'a-Sef thou shalt not be brought together וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo or תִקָּבֵ֑ץ <S%H6908><s%> tik-ka-Vetz; nor gathered לְחַיַּ֥ת <S%H2416><s%> le-chai-Yat to the beasts הָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz of the field וּלְע֥וֹף <S%H5775><s%> u-le-'of and to the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim of the heaven נְתַתִּ֥יךָ <S%H5414><s%> ne-tat-Ti-cha I have given לְאָכְלָֽה׃ <S%H402><s%> le-'och-Lah thee for meat

וְיָֽדְעוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-de-'U shall know כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei And all the inhabitants מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; that I [am] the LORD יַ֧עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an Because הֱיוֹתָ֛ם <S%H1961><s%> he-yo-Tam have been מִשְׁעֶ֥נֶת <S%H4938><s%> mish-'E-net because they have been a staff קָנֶ֖ה <S%H7070><s%> ka-Neh of reed לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit to the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

בְּתָפְשָׂ֨ם <S%H8610><s%> be-ta-fe-Sam When they took hold בְּךָ֤ be-Cha ; בַכַּפְךָ vak-kaf-cha כבַכַּף֙ <S%H3709><s%> vak-Kaf branch קתֵּר֔וֹץ <S%H7533><s%> te-Rotz, thou didst break וּבָקַעְתָּ֥ <S%H1234><s%> u-va-ka'-Ta and rend לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all כָּתֵ֑ף <S%H3802><s%> ka-Tef; all their shoulder וּבְהִֽשָּׁעֲנָ֤ם <S%H8172><s%> u-ve-hish-sha-'a-Nam and when they leaned עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha on תִּשָּׁבֵ֔ר <S%H7665><s%> tish-sha-Ver, upon thee thou brakest וְהַעֲמַדְתָּ֥ <S%H5976><s%> ve-ha-'a-mad-Ta to be at a stand לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all מָתְנָֽיִם׃ <S%H4975><s%> ma-te-Na-yim. and madest all their loins ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen, Therefore כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, GOD הִנְנִ֛י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold מֵבִ֥יא <S%H935><s%> me-Vi Behold I will bring עָלַ֖יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-La-yich upon חָ֑רֶב <S%H2719><s%> Cha-rev; a sword וְהִכְרַתִּ֥י <S%H3772><s%> ve-hich-rat-Ti upon thee and cut off מִמֵּ֖ךְ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Mech at אָדָ֥ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam man וּבְהֵמָֽה׃ <S%H929><s%> u-ve-he-Mah. and beast

וְהָיְתָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-ye-Tah will become אֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> 'e-retz- And the land מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt לִשְׁמָמָ֣ה <S%H8077><s%> lish-ma-Mah shall be desolate וְחָרְבָּ֔ה <S%H2723><s%> ve-cha-re-Bah, and waste וְיָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> ve-ya-de-'U and they shall know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; that I [am] the LORD יַ֧עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an Because אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar because he hath said יְאֹ֥ר <S%H2975><s%> ye-'Or The river לִ֖י li וַאֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I עָשִֽׂיתִי׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Si-ti. [is] mine and I have made

לָכֵ֛ן <S%H3651><s%> la-Chen therefore הִנְנִ֥י <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ni behold אֵלֶ֖יךָ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lei-cha I am against וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and against יְאֹרֶ֑יךָ <S%H2975><s%> ye-'o-Rei-cha; Behold therefore I [am] against thee and against thy rivers וְנָתַתִּ֞י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti and I will make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz the land מִצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt לְחָרְבוֹת֙ <S%H2723><s%> le-cha-re-Vot waste חֹ֣רֶב <S%H2721><s%> Cho-rev utterly שְׁמָמָ֔ה <S%H8077><s%> she-ma-Mah, [and] desolate מִמִּגְדֹּ֥ל <S%H4024><s%> mi-mig-Dol from the tower סְוֵנֵ֖ה <S%H5482><s%> se-ve-Neh of Syene וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- and even גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul even unto the border כּֽוּשׁ׃ <S%H3568><s%> Kush. of Ethiopia

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo will not תַעֲבָר־ <S%H5674><s%> ta-'a-vor- shall pass through בָּהּ֙ bah רֶ֣גֶל <S%H7272><s%> Re-gel No foot אָדָ֔ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of man וְרֶ֥גֶל <S%H7272><s%> ve-Re-gel it nor foot בְּהֵמָ֖ה <S%H929><s%> be-he-Mah of beast לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo will not תַעֲבָר־ <S%H5674><s%> ta-'a-vor- shall pass through בָּ֑הּ Bah; וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and it תֵשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> te-Shev it neither shall it be inhabited אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im forty שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah. years

וְנָתַתִּ֣י <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Ti And I will make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֶרֶץ֩ <S%H776><s%> 'e-Retz the land מִצְרַ֨יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt שְׁמָמָ֜ה <S%H8077><s%> she-ma-Mah desolate בְּת֣וֹךְ׀ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch in the midst אֲרָצ֣וֹת <S%H776><s%> a-ra-Tzot of the countries נְשַׁמּ֗וֹת <S%H8074><s%> ne-sham-Mot, [that are] desolate וְעָרֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5892><s%> ve-'a-Rei-ha and her cities בְּת֨וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch among עָרִ֤ים <S%H5892><s%> 'a-Rim the cities מָֽחֳרָבוֹת֙ <S%H2717><s%> mo-cho-ra-Vot [that are] laid waste תִּֽהְיֶ֣יןָ <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yei-na become שְׁמָמָ֔ה <S%H8077><s%> she-ma-Mah, shall be desolate אַרְבָּעִ֖ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im forty שָׁנָ֑ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah; years וַהֲפִצֹתִ֤י <S%H6327><s%> va-ha-fi-tzo-Ti and I will scatter אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim the Egyptians בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> bag-go-Yim, among the nations וְֽזֵרִיתִ֖ים <S%H2219><s%> ve-ze-ri-Tim and will disperse בָּאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <S%H776><s%> ba-'a-ra-Tzot. them through the countries פ Peh

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki For כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Yet thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh; GOD מִקֵּ֞ץ <S%H7093><s%> mik-Ketz At the end אַרְבָּעִ֤ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-ba-'Im of forty שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years אֲקַבֵּ֣ץ <S%H6908><s%> 'a-kab-Betz will I gather אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, the Egyptians מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָעַמִּ֖ים <S%H5971><s%> ha-'am-Mim from the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- they נָפֹ֥צוּ <S%H6327><s%> na-Fo-tzu whither they were scattered שָֽׁמָּה׃ <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah. in it

וְשַׁבְתִּי֙ <S%H7725><s%> ve-shav-Ti And I will bring again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁב֣וּת <S%H7622><s%> she-Vut the captivity מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֤י <S%H7725><s%> va-ha-shi-vo-Ti and will cause them to return אֹתָם֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz [into] the land פַּתְר֔וֹס <S%H6624><s%> pat-Ros, of Pathros עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto אֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz into the land מְכֽוּרָתָ֑ם <S%H4351><s%> me-chu-ra-Tam; of their habitation וְהָ֥יוּ <S%H1961><s%> ve-Ha-yu become שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> sham and there מַמְלָכָ֥ה <S%H4467><s%> mam-la-Chah kingdom שְׁפָלָֽה׃ <S%H8217><s%> she-fa-Lah. and they shall be there a base

מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הַמַּמְלָכוֹת֙ <S%H4467><s%> ham-mam-la-chOt of the kingdoms תִּהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> tih-Yeh become שְׁפָלָ֔ה <S%H8217><s%> she-fa-Lah, It shall be the basest וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- will never תִתְנַשֵּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> tit-nas-Se neither shall it exalt ע֖וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od again עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- above הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim; itself any more above the nations וְהִ֨מְעַטְתִּ֔ים <S%H4591><s%> ve-Him-'at-Tim, for I will diminish לְבִלְתִּ֖י <S%H1115><s%> le-vil-Ti they will not רְד֥וֹת <S%H7287><s%> re-Dot them that they shall no more rule בַּגּוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> bag-go-Yim. over the nations
